00012 Compound_Selector* compound_selector(string src)
00013 { return Parser::from_c_str(src.c_str(), ctx, "", Position()).parse_simple_selector_sequence(); }
00014 
00015 Complex_Selector* complex_selector(string src)
00016 { return Parser::from_c_str(src.c_str(), ctx, "", Position()).parse_selector_combination(); }

00018 void check_compound(string s1, string s2)
00019 {
00020   cout << "Is "
00021        << s1
00022        << " a superselector of "
00023        << s2
00024        << "?\t"
00025        << compound_selector(s1 + ";")->is_superselector_of(compound_selector(s2 + ";"))

00034        << s2
